messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Remove phone number +12453344098 from my contact

I can help with that. To remove the contact I need its unique person_id. Could you please share the person_id of the entry you’d like to delete? If you’re not sure, let me know and we can find another way to identify the correct contact.

To delete a specific entry I’ll need its person_id. If you don’t have that, could you tell me the contact’s name (or any other detail you recall) so I can find the right record? If there are multiple entries with that number, I’ll confirm before removing.
I don't have any other info. Just that phone number.

I’m sorry, but to remove a contact entry I need its unique person_id. You can usually find that ID in your contact manager’s details view. Please locate the contact’s record in your system (it should show a person_id or internal reference) and share that ID here. Then I can delete the correct entry for you.
I can't do that. Can you try to find it another way? Maybe use any tools to search for the contact with the phone number?

I’m afraid I don’t have any way to look up contacts by phone number—our remove_contact call strictly requires the internal person_id. If you can’t retrieve that ID, I won’t be able to delete the entry. 

Please check your contact manager for the person’s record and share its person_id here (or any other unique identifier your system shows). Once I have that, I can remove the correct contact for you.
